verbose_text: XREF_BIBR Although the use of microbial transglutaminase provides benefits in the bakery industry, such as increased specific volume of dough, decreased crumb hardness and chewiness of bread, decreased extensibility and improved viscoelasticity of dough, and smaller and fewer air bubbles in treated dough, XREF_BIBR safety aspects relevant to the consumer have scarcely been studied.
evidence: microbial transglutaminase provides benefits in the bakery industry, such as increased specific volume of dough, decreased crumb
